s: Having two school-age children, Mike and Inga recognize the importance of teaching and inspiring kids with the stories of resilience and selflessness. That's how the Fenrici idea was born and it was named after their two kids' names in Latin.

At Fenrici, we build quality family products while inspiring the spirit of resilience through stories, community, and compassion. We partner with families and children who have been touched by pediatric rare diseases to share the stories of determination, hope, and selflessness.

s: Every child deserves to live a full and happy life, no matter their challenges. Our brand was born out of a desire to support the community of rare pediatric diseases. A portion of every purchase from Fenrici benefits research, education, and community for children and families affected.
